name: ListPropertyDefinitions
description:
Retrieve a list of property definitions for a specific project.

Use this tool to fetch property definitions from a specified project by providing the project ID. It returns the available property definitions related to that project.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: ID of the project you're accessing. Use /api/projects/ to find it.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: event_names_json
parameters.description: A JSON-encoded string of event names to populate `is_seen_on_filtered_events` in the response.

value_schema.description: If sent, response value will have `is_seen_on_filtered_events` populated. JSON-encoded

parameters.name: excluded_properties_list
parameters.description: A JSON-encoded list of property names to exclude from the response.

value_schema.description: JSON-encoded list of excluded properties

parameters.name: group_type_index_for_group_properties
parameters.description: Provide the group type index specifically for properties of type 'group'. This should only be set if the type is set to 'group'.

value_schema.description: What group type is the property for. Only should be set if `type=group`

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results to return per page when retrieving property definitions.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.name: result_start_index
parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results. Use this to paginate through results starting from a specific index.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: filter_properties_list
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to filter the results by.

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of properties to filter

parameters.name: search_query
parameters.description: Keyword to search properties by name in the project.

value_schema.description: Searches properties by name

parameters.name: property_definition_type
parameters.description: Specify which type of property definitions to return: 'event', 'person', 'group', or 'session'.

value_schema.description:
What property definitions to return

* `event` - event
* `person` - person
* `group` - group
* `session` - session

parameters.name: exclude_core_properties
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude core properties from the response; false to include them.

value_schema.description: Whether to exclude core properties

parameters.name: exclude_hidden_properties
parameters.description: Set to true to exclude properties marked as hidden from the results.

value_schema.description: Whether to exclude properties marked as hidden

parameters.name: filter_properties_by_event_names
parameters.description: Set to true to return only properties for events specified in `event_names`.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only properties for events in `event_names`

parameters.name: filter_feature_flag_properties
parameters.description: Set to true to include only feature flag properties, false to exclude them.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only (or excluding) feature flag properties

parameters.name: include_only_numerical_properties
parameters.description: Set to true to return only numerical property definitions, false to exclude them.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only (or excluding) numerical property definitions

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

value_schema.description: Number of results to return per page.

parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

value_schema.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: properties
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to filter

value_schema.description: Comma-separated list of properties to filter

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Searches properties by name

value_schema.description: Searches properties by name

parameters.description:
What property definitions to return

* `event` - event

* `session` - session
